website_summaries.verdict: A flattering, simple jumpsuit that won't break the bank.
pros: Holds up well through multiple washes
Available in multiple colors and styles
Easy to dress up or down
Sits at a low price point
cons: Drawstring is for aesthetics only, not adjustable

customer_reviews.title: Who says you can’t look hot in a onesie??
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and am SO happy with it. Ya girl is bottom heavy (thank you Latina genes and squats), but my top isn’t heavy, if you get what I’m saying. This is low cut, so if you want the girls to hide, then maybe wear a tank? But by all means, let em out, if that’s what makes you happy! I can’t wait to wear this out in public and be able to do drunken high kicks without worrying about people seeing my stuff! OH! Also, I’m 5’3”, weight doesn’t matter because not all bodies are the same. But I did get a medium. If that helps anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Emmaline

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I can’t be happier about this purchase!! Fit great , good quality and price. I am 5,2” 154lb I ordered M.
customer_reviews.author: J.O

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute romper. Bought for easy access nursing with the button top, great to toss on and take the kids to school with flip flops or dress up with heels for a date! Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Hali Farney

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: So if you are anything like me, when buying clothes online you live by the reviews. I am 5’4, 145 and bought the medium. The bottom fit great, but the top was a bit big. I wear a 34 DDD so I don’t think that is the problem. If you have a long torso, the waist is cut pretty high. I chose to wear a cardigan over mine, as it showed off a big more that I would like. All in all I like it. I’ve worn it twice so far! Each time with a different cardigan.
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty low cut, and I like lower cut, needed a tank top underneath. Looks pretty good for myself being a curvier woman. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: mary Glittenberg

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this jumpsuit to an all black party and everyone loved it! It has a nice fit. Definitely true to size.
customer_reviews.author: arianna

customer_reviews.title: If you have bigger hips size up
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely hesitant to buy this jumpsuit as I felt I didn’t have the body type for it . When I tried it on I couldn’t believe how well it fit . I sized up to a large and glad that I did. All the review show true to size but I have bigger hips so sizing up was definitely a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby how you feeling?! GOOD AS HELL
customer_reviews.text: I AM IN LOVE! I am 5’7 about 185 lbs and hunny I feel SEXY. I sized up to an XL just to be safe and I’m glad I did. Hugs my body in all the right places without being to snug and still has somewhat of a loose fit at the same time.i can wear with sneakers or dress up with heels. I want it in every color! I can’t believe the price ! This outfit make me feel so good! So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JRae

customer_reviews.title: Good fit - 5'9 and 130 lbs ordered Medium
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good and seems to match the photo. The only thing I wish if the tie string in the front was real so you could tighten it to adjust the fit. It's not. The tie is just for show. I'm 5'9 and 130 lbs and ordered a medium and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Mae

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love the material, the style and the fit. I love most of my clothes snug and fitted. I don’t like them loose. This jumpsuit fitted snug and perfect. Not uncomfortable yet had a little room in the belly area. I’m 5’4, 155, and 36D. I’m surprised it wasn’t right on my chest since I have issues with that most of the time. I got a medium in black and even the length was perfect. I really like the material. It wasn’t see through so that’s even another plus. I will be purchasing the other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: The Most Amazing Outfit
customer_reviews.text: This jumper is fantastic! I am 5'0 about 128lb, an A/B cup and the small fit perfect. It cuffs right at the ankles but those cuffs stretch so when it got a little hot during the day I could pull the pant legs up to make it look like capris and it was perfect. There is plenty of stretch in the waist band making it comfortable. The fabric is breathable. The straps have the ability to lengthen and get shorter which is perfect for someone who doesn't have a large chest like me. I threw a crop jean jacket over it completing the look but I think you can wear it without anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casual and sexy
customer_reviews.text: I have a long torso and am bottom heavy and it fits! I'm a curvy size 12 and the large fit exactly how I wanted. If you want a more baggy look size up especially if you are curvy. I'm wearing this as a swimsuit cover to the beach. It's light and comfortable so would work for any casual outing or could be layered to dress up. The cotton is soft enough to lounge in.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thinking I would have to return it, it would be to small or not fit nicely. Boy was I wrong. I love this romper and wear it frequently. Only wish is they were more of capris vs pants (but that is not what I purchases) they have bans at the bottom I can pull up. They is flattering, and so comfy to wear. Looks cute when you are going out and want to dress it up, or just taking your kids to the park and want to be comfortable. Definitely going to be purchasing other colors. For reference I am 5'7 153lbs and I purchased a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much, I bought a second.
customer_reviews.text: Super flattering, relaxed fit, and this one can be dressed up or down. The material is a very thin, so great for warm climates/seasons without being suffocating. I'm a huge fan of jumpsuits, but bc of my height & bust size, I'm really picky about the fit. This one fit so well, I ordered a second! The chest is very roomy, the elastic waist is comfortable, and the length is great. I say it fits true to size; I personally wouldn't size down bc the waist may be too snug, and a size up would be too large in the chest (and I'm a 34DD).
customer_reviews.author: Sherry G. Beard

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, and not too tight!
customer_reviews.text: For reference, I’m about 5’7 and 130 pounds, and I love the fit of this jumpsuit! It’s not too thin (with normal underwear I’m not seeing underwear lines), and the material is soft (but not flimsy). The v-neck isn’t too low cut, and you can wear it with a strapless bra without showing. I like that the torso/waist fits well enough that it’s not clingy on the belly area. It also falls just right at my ankles, so I probably will not be drying in the dryer (just based on the likely shrinkage of the material). Perfect loungewear for isolating at home, and it will definitely be easy to dress up for going out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order size DOWN
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I order this jumpsuit for the 4th of July. As I put it on I was so happy that before I fully got it on that it felt so comfortable. Once I put it on I was kinda bummed. I was just to big. I am 165 lb 5'4. I order a large. I was trying to pull the legs a little up my leg. The legs on the jumpsuit wouldn't stay up. The straps were to big and keep slipping off. The color was true to what it in the picture. I believe if I order a medium it would of fit way better. I was unable to wear it on Saturday because it was to big.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am completely satisfied with this purchase. It gave me so much life. I got so many compliments. It’s very comfortable & so beautiful. The fit was so perfect. I would suggest any and every women to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 Kings

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I just love this! So comfortable for summer. I ordered an XL and it fit great. Im 5'5, 200lbs, 36H, super curvy body. If you are top heavy your cleavage with show.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and so cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute romper, very convenient for nursing mamas and also comfy. It looks great casual or throw on a sleek jacket and dress it up. I’d prefer functional drawstrings but I love love love that it has adjustable straps especially for us more petite ladies. Highly recommend this product, such a steal of a deal
customer_reviews.author: Sweets_87

customer_reviews.title: Top and bottom not the same size
customer_reviews.text: I loved this jumpsuit until I put it on. The army green color was very nice and the fabric was soft and stretchy. The top was so big that I couldn't wear it without flashing my boobs and most of my back, even with the front button closed. The bottom was just a smidge too small, so, it goes back. For reference I am 5' 8", 140, size 6 bottom and 36 C+ bust.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing wayyyy off
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. I do not have a strange figure yet this fit like I did. The bottom half was ok, albeit too long. But the top half was comically big. I am large chested (32ddd) and this hung on me like a parachute. I bought a medium based on other reviews but I think even a small would have been too big. I wouldn't recommend and I won't be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy this jumpsuit!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jumpsuit! I got the v-neck that has one small button and loop in the front to keep the v together. The fabric is on the thicker side and not at all see through. It fits true to size. I’m 5’6” and weigh 140lbs and a medium fits perfectly. It fits a little tight through the hips/butt which I like. The elastic waistband is not adjustable and the tie in front is just for looks. The top is loose but not too baggy. It’s super cute and can easily be dressed up or down. Really fast shipping. I ordered and got it the very next day! I’m definitely buying one in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible Quality!! I read the reviews before my purchase and most were good with a few people complaining about the quality. So I took a risk and unfortunately my package arrived today Already Damaged!!! The elastic on the inside it's totally broken and unravelling. The color and feel of the material is nice though and I do like the appearance of it so this was VERY disappointing!! Will be returning this ASAP!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and very stylish! Love the design and I think it’s going to become a year round staple. I was hesitant about getting a Medium, since I usually wear a 6 and with a lot of Amazon products I find sizes in Large tend to fit better. But it was actually the opposite; the shoulder straps were a little loose but fit perfectly after adjustment. I also found the waist fits comfortably snug (not too tight or loose). Great buy and would happily recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this fit
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I am 5'8, about 150 pounds, and I bought a Medium. It is a little short, but that doesn't bother me because it works with the style. I've worn this basically every day since I received it, and I honestly want to order more. I's very comfortable, flattering, and feels appropriate for summer. Buying online is always a risk but this was a hit.
customer_reviews.author: DesRoulette

customer_reviews.title: Cute jumpsuit at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this jumpsuit. I’m 5’2” so most of the time jumpsuits are long on me, by this one was perfect! I ordered a small and it fit very well. I’m glad that there is a button to keep the top closed in the chest area. I wore it to brunch with my friends and shopping with my mom and I got lots of compliments! I will definitely be wearing it again!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Multi-seasonal attire
customer_reviews.text: I really like this navy jumpsuit with the buttons. You can wear it alone when it’s warmer out or with a Jean jacket or cardigan when it’s cooler out. I purchased a medium and it’s super comfortable, fits exact and very affordable. I would love to have one for every day of the week, but I plan on buying at least one more color without the buttons for a looser fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sequenthia Henson

customer_reviews.title: The most comfy day wear ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first jumpsuit purchase. I was so intimidated and worried I would hate it. I am 5'1", wear a size 1 or 2, 34ddd. I ordered a size small, it has plenty of room and covers my funbags well. I definitely recommend this purchase. My only complaint is I cannot use the button because my bust is large. I will room the button and secure with fashion tape. Can't wait to try the other similar styles.
customer_reviews.author: MsTexas

customer_reviews.title: Cute & versatile jumpsuit
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of this jumpsuit. It's very versatile; simple to dress up or dress down. I'm 5'3" and typically wear a 4/6. The medium fit well. I deducted a star from the jumpsuit because of the button that closes the front of the jumpsuit. It was designed to be hidden, but it constantly pop out. However, I'm still incredibly happy with the purchase and I can't wait to wear it on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: YU FAMILY

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Got Navy Blue in Medium. 5'1" approx 135lbs, full bust and butt, but fits me very well. I got a small at first, but would not fit my thighs as it's a little slim in the legs. Medium fit perfectly, though. Fabric is very soft and, though on the thinner side, does not feel cheap. Color is a little darker than in the pictures, but still is obviously navy. The ways it looks on the model in the pictures is pretty accurate, just need to find the right size. Overall, I really like it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ceci24

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this jumpsuit. It’s so comfy and it fit as I expected it to. I am 5feet so I knew it was going to be a little baggy at my ankles. I am also a 40dd so I thought it was going to be really tight around my chest, but it actually fit perfectly. I got a size large. I do have a belly so I knew from the side it may not be as flattering, but with some spanx or something to hold it all in I think it will be fine. From the front, it looks really good even on my short frame. I love the pockets too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this jumpsuit-it’s the best!
customer_reviews.text: Love this romper. Can’t say enough. It’s soft and flattering and the neck line is feminine. I don’t even use the button and just wear a cute bralette underneath. I’m 5’5” around 120 and small fits right. Love the jogger pant legs-so much cuter than the wide leg and full length legs on the other jumpsuits out there.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzy

customer_reviews.title: The Best Romper Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this romper! It fits perfectly in my usual size and hugs me in all the right places. It is so flattering and comfortable, I could wear it anywhere and plan to do just that. I want to order it in more colors because I was so impressed by it. I tried to bunch it up on my calves as seen in other pictures but that didn't look right on me so I plan on wearing the legs down and the length is perfect. Get it, you won't regret it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise77

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I washed this twice and there were already little holes alllll over the butt area by the seam! Thank goodness I found before I wore out.too bad because it was SO cute Edit: the company did get back with me and sent me a brand new one very quickly. It seems good and hopefully will hold up. We will see and I will update. Good customer service
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and  Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly cute and comfortable! I wore it to a picnic event with some Chuck's and got many compliments on it. It is so comfortable and very flattering. I'm athletic and curvy, I probably could have gotten away with a small for a tighter fit, but I went with my regular size of medium.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Smith

customer_reviews.title: great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant because when I purchased it, it automatically filled my size as a medium. I wear that size but as you know sometimes clothes on Amazon can be a little off. I received it and it was so perfect. I'm 5'9 and 160 pounds and it fit exactly how it should. Super comfortable can dress it up or down and feel like you're in your pj's either way. Not to mention, what a price!
customer_reviews.author: Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! Casual, quick, easy & still cute!
customer_reviews.text: This jumper is very comfortable, quick easy and casual. It is flattering! I find it perfect for the weekends on the go. You can wear your bathing suit underneath it On vacay or you can add some earrings lipstick and a cute flat and you are ready to go for whatever the day brings! I have a bigger bottom and thighs so I found it just a little on the smaller side but nothing crazy. At 5’1 145 lbs I ordered a medium and I’m good with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable...perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This jumper is super comfortable and versatile. You can wear it with sandals to be casual or heels for a night out. Absolutely love that there is a small button on the top so that you don't show too much for a family friendly outfit (or you can keep it unbuttoned for a sexy look).
customer_reviews.author: MamaLang2011

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite outfit
customer_reviews.text: I cant say enough how much I love this outfit! Normally rompers and I do not get along. This one fits like a glove and shows off my figure beautifully. I ordered a small, I'm 5'7, 125lbs and a 32DDD. I plan to order more in different colors. I definitely recommend this and have sent it to a few of my friends as well!
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Great Romper- Even for Tall Women!
customer_reviews.text: I'm lean at 5'10 and 130 lb and sometimes have a hard time finding rompers that fit, but this one did the trick! I ordered in size Medium. The elastic waistband is very forgiving and can be adjusted on the torso to accommodate most heights. The fabric is incredibly soft as well! I will be wearing this all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: PsychologyPro

customer_reviews.title: Order now
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this outfit so far in 3 different colors. I’m a size 16 or 1X in jeans.. 2x depending on the denim. The XL for me great. Love the material. Not see through. I’m 5’4 and they hit just below my ankle but do not drag, so they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca R

customer_reviews.title: Who puts a button there?
customer_reviews.text: I would've given a better review but theres this button that is used to hold the two parts together and Its hard to use and I am going to change it to a snap. the pockets are huge (which is aways great) the tie in the front is purely decorative but the elexstic is good in the front. I ordered a size larger because I wanted it loose.
customer_reviews.author: Brigid S

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because of the negative reviews. I'm so happy I took the chance, it fits great! Similar to some of the recent pictures that were posted. I am 5'3 120lbs, the small is a perfect fit and a button on the top in case I want to hide the cleavage. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: I love amazon

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected, comfy & cute!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5", 125 lbs, ordered a small and it fits very well. Material is soft and stretchy and doesn't gape too much at the chest, so will feel comfortable to wear this without a bra (yay!). There's also the snap at the front to help with closure. (And don't we all need a little closure?) Will probably try to air dry this after washings though, fearful a shrink or two will make it too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, practical
customer_reviews.text: I liked fit of this jumpsuit, other than the very low cut neckline. I haven't worn it for longer than trying it on, but i plan to wear it to the beach this weekend. Will update review later. Edit: I wore this past weekend and loved it! Perfect for the beach, or just about anytime! It was very comfortable! Will wear this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: A. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Good quality jumper
customer_reviews.text: I loved this jumper! It’s the perfect casual outfit that can still be dressed up! It is very slimming and a nice thick quality material! I really liked the jogger style on the pants because for being short it usually jumpers are too long or baggy at the bottom for me. Also the top is a racer back so you don’t need to wear a strapless if you have a racer back bra! All around cheap, but good quality jumper! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: Love it for a girl that is 150 LB & 5’3 height like me
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Medium & I’m 5’3 in height & I weigh 150 pounds & I’m a 34 C cup in bra. I carry most of my weight on my lower body & thighs. This outfit for me well but it’s almost too tight. If you are pear shape like me and want a loose baggy look then go for a large. But if you want it fitted & a bit tight then stick to a medium. The material is thin, lightweight & cool for summer. I love this outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbread

customer_reviews.title: The easiest way to look cute
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a pleasant surprise! I ordered this jumpsuit because of the price and reviews but man was I excited when I tried it on! It's super flattering, comfortable, and sexy! Dress it up with heels, or down with flip flops. Either way, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to wear on a flight so I could still be comfortable but look put together for a dinner we had planned when we landed. I didn't expect to be walking around the Redwoods in it but that's what happened. I was so comfortable the whole time. I really do love this little jumpsuit and have gotten many compliments on it. I gave it 4 stars because the tie is just decorative. The elastic waist still give you a nice shape though.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Orton

customer_reviews.title: The style & fit are right on!
customer_reviews.text: The style is so flattering with a snug fit around the bum and waist. The button enclosure is a bit odd. The sewing and fit is good quality. It's the lowest end of stretch. The material isn't the greatest its fairly thin and rough even after a wash. For $15 this is all to be expected and well worth it for the great style/fit!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for my first jumpsuit. I knew I wanted a gathered waist, V-neck, not super wide legs, and of course, POCKETS! This met all my demands and fits perfectly. For reference I am 5'8, 180lbs, wear a size Large/14 and got this in Large.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap button holes!
customer_reviews.text: The major issue with this jumpsuit is the button hold are so cheaply sewn, that when you put the huttons through the holes, it’s breaks the seams the holes are stretched out and it looks awful! Other than that it’s nice, but the button holes ruin the outfit.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Cute look but falling apart on the first wear
customer_reviews.text: Love the look - it's lightweight, easy to wear, fashionable, affordable. But keep in mind that you're paying for quality, after having washed it before my first wear, I noticed that things were already starting to unravel on the first wear, 30m or so in. Don't expect this to last more than a few wears without having to be hand sewn back together.
customer_reviews.author: LChung

customer_reviews.title: Purchase it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6 and 130 lbs and ordered a medium. I. Am. In. Love! This is my first romper purchase and I love it! Super comfortable and I love the button in the front to make it a more modest if you want. Will definitely be purchasing another one!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6 and about 154 lbs. I got size Medium in black and it fits it’s stretchy enough and very flattering. The only oops I have with the product is too button hole is a little trenched out. Otherwise, very happy with the jumpsuit!
customer_reviews.author: agapeska

customer_reviews.title: Easy, comfortable, cute
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright cobalt blue color. Fits very well through out, including the leg length, but would also look cute as bunched up capris. The elastic waist hits at natural waist line. It is not long enough to “fluff over” like a tucked in look, however. The front tie is a different fabric and color but it does not seem to be structural. I personally think the tie cheapens the look of the garment but can be easily replaced or removed. 5’5” 114lbs * I have not yet washed it so any shrinking is not noted.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Love-Love-Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumpsuit so much that I ordered 4 more in different colors. They're so soft. Very flattering. I can wear it around the house then put cute shoes and a sweater to dress it up. I get so many compliments! I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: High Altitude

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS JUMPSUIT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this jumpsuit! So comfortable and makes you look amazing! The only downside is that there is a button in the front to close up, but since I am busty that button is always visible. I am not sure if it’s suppose to be that way, but I plan on buying in more styles/colors!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Kenar

customer_reviews.title: Great staple outfit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this outfit. It wasn’t too tight and is very comfy, it can be dressed up or down. Some of the other reviews said it is too low cut, which I don’t mind, but to my surprise there’s actually a button so you can adjust the V-neck to your liking. I’m 5’3 for reference and got a small.
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: So surprised this romper is really flattering on short and plus size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Vacation or Vegas romper. I am 5’3 and almost 200lb I was sure I would need a XL and it might be too long, the length in the xl was fine but although I have a stomach the middle section was a little looser than I would want for the fit. I will be reordering a large. So comfortable and soft material, the connecting button under the chest area might show a bit if you are a D cup. I usually don’t fine that rompers look okay on me and this was really cute and forgiving, I just had too much room in the stomach area, which was a first :)
customer_reviews.author: Justin Salazar

customer_reviews.title: After a few adjustments, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: The tie in the front is a faux tie, I cut it off because it hung weird. I also had to move the button on the button closure at the v because it didn’t fasten correctly. I also ended up cutting the inside elastic at spots bc it was gathered very very tight and as an xl I’m not tiny at the waist. Overall, I love it! Those are all things I was ok with adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: Cara U.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly sewn
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter's approaching bday. Based on reviews, I was certain it would be perfect. Got it yesterday, tried it on..it fit so I washed it. Today I am wearing it for the first time. The button to adjust how much cleavage is showing broke off immediately. I let that go. Then 5 hrs into wearing it, I discover that the waist tie is falling off. It's cute, it is however poorly constructed. I am pretty bummed as it couldn't handle a single wash and wear without falling apart. I recommend that the company put some better tailorship into the garment.
customer_reviews.author: Sydni Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Wear anywhere, anytime.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Have worn to work with long sweater, worn it for grocery shopping, worn to yoga, and lounged around at home. So comfortable. I wish there was a real belt but it is otherwise perfect. You could even sleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cute jumpsuit for my wife. Delivery was quick and the color is perfect. The fabric is lightweight, but not flimsy. We agree with others that the placement of the button that holds the top closed is too high, but that's a minor flaw. Overall a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Cap'nR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Summer Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumpsuit. Such a good fit and super stylish. I can see myself wearing this a lot this summer. I got it in blue and it is a soft jersey material. I am 130 pounds- 5'3 and got the small. It was a bit loose in the top area but I will be comfortable wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandazz

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Um... I LOVE this jumpsuit!! I'm a size 12/14 with 36 DDD bra, 5'7" and 230lbs. Ordered the xl and it fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: PamPam

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and so cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This romper is so cute! I order this one along with five others and this is the only one I kept. It’s super comfortable, the fabric is very soft. I even got approval from my 9 year old daughter :) I ordered an XL.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: I got the medium and it fits PERFECTLY. I am 5'4, 136lb. The material is a really great quality. I know my stupid phone is not doing any justice to the outfit...lol. I am so in love with it, will be getting the green and blue.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy. I chose red for me. the color you see in pictures is the color you will perceive. I'm 5'7 and 122pounds 32dd. I ordered s and I'm glad i did. I would definitely recommend to anyone who wants a easy quick outfit for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Devil Doll

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute romper! perfect for day or night time wear. The buttons in the front are functional and the waist is elastic (faux drawstring). I am 5'3'' and 145 lbs and the medium fit perfectly in length and size. it does not wrinkle easily which is a huge pro. The material is thin but not see-through so its perfect for a hot summer day. I got tons of compliments on it! This company has fast shipping with great service. I will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: Wow...I got this for my Anniversary dinner. It super comfy yet sexy. Shows the right amount of cleavage but also has a button if you want to be more conservative. I'm a new mom and it's very flattering to my "new body". I will but in another color. I'm 185lbs, 40H, 5ft...I got a XL.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great throw on outfit
customer_reviews.text: I love the buttons on the jumpsuit, adds cute style and more flattering for me because of large breasts. I want more of these in different colors, and I will order more of them and get a size larger so it has the baggy look. Super comfy and easy to throw on! Price and fit are both great!
customer_reviews.author: sheva

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with rompers and jump suits due to having a long torso. This has enough of a “blousing” effect that it fits my torso well! Very cute. It does run a tad big, I could go a size down. I’m 5’6 145 pounds. The material is a bit stiff, but I think with a few washing’s it will be fine. Overall very cute and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for quarantine fashion! I needed something other than sweatpants to hang around in and run errands in and this fit the bill! I’m 5’7 and 140, athletic build and got a medium, if that helps you in sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: A Summer Staple
customer_reviews.text: Love this romper! I tried it on and instantly fell in love! I've worn it for casual days with convers and to dinner parties with a pair of heels. Love the color, the material and style fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Tia Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Light material, tight in the chest
customer_reviews.text: I love the material, very comfortable. Even the length was ok for my 5'3" height and it made my butt look great. The only thing the medium was very tight in the chest area. I'm a 36 DD. I want a large, but wondering if the butt part will be loose because in a medium is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl bradley

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well this fit me! I'm 5'3 and about 170 pounds 36ddd and it was really cute and flattering! I returned because there was a little grease stain on it. I purchased the same one in Purple.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: So adorable! Very easy to dress this up or down. Super comfortable. I typically have a hard time with length when buying pants that aren’t “petite” - but the length is perfect (5’0, 125 lbs). I would definitely recommend this. Quality could probably be a bit better, but wash on delicate and don’t put in the dryer, and it’s a great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Bethanne Kushner

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This jumpsuit is very comfortable and unfussy. It’s easy to get on and off and can easily be dressed up or down, although I think it lends itself to being casual with the drawstring and the soft material. The button closure was a little too high up on my chest but leaving it unbuttoned wasn’t revealing at all.
customer_reviews.author: mmmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Check for tears and damage!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to find a tear in the jumpsuit upon opening the package because I’ve been waiting for this to come in stock. I have ordered other jumpsuits and really love them! They are so comfortable and convenient for everyday wear. But I had to give a 3 stars because every order should be checked before being mailed out. I’m not buying a clearance item for me to have to check it for damages.
customer_reviews.author: Moe & Jihan

customer_reviews.title: Cute item
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumpsuit so much. To start, it fits as expected! There is a button if you don’t want the top to be too exposing - looks cute buttoned or unbuttoned. The strings around the waist do not tighten the item they’re just for show but there is an elastic around the waist which helps show off your shape better. You can dress it up with heels or down with sneakers v. versatile. I’m only 5’3 so for me to find a jumpsuit that fits nicely with my height & looks good is hard!
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Great garment for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its a great garment for the price. Bought a medium, I am 5'7" and 150lbs and it fits perfect. Thankful that the top is adjustable to show more skin and not ride up. Its comfortable, but I was hoping for a softer fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Great for petites!
customer_reviews.text: BUY THIS! I'm petite 5'3 under 120 so it's hard to judge buying clothes online. But after retrieving so many other rompers this one is AMAZING! There's enough scrunch in the mid section. You definitely need to wear pasties with it- a bra would fit odd. But the length and style is really flattering. I went back and ordered the other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: CUTE & COMFY
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this jumpsuit and LOVE it! I originally ordered a medium but found it was too big on top (I have a shorter torso). I'm 5'4" and 135 and the small fits perfectly. The material is good quality and opaque; soft and stretchy. I love the pockets and the adjustable spaghetti straps in the back. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Theis

customer_reviews.title: Got so many compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Product came fast! Also the material is light but not too light where you can see though it. I wear it with heels and a tan top under for work (because it low cut). But when i go out with friends ill wear sandals and pasties and your good to go!. Want more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfortable , stylish, and I was even able to wear it at work. I dressed it up with heels. I got a ton of compliments. It’s a little loose, but I’m short and petite ... I got a size small but pulling up the pant leg and cinching the waist string was all I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Jak

customer_reviews.title: Fav Amazon buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jumpsuit for a football game and it was super comfy! Seriously one of my fav Amazon finds. The fit of the jumpsuit is perfect, not too tight and not too loose. You can easily dress it up with some heels and cute accessories or make it more casual with a blue Jean jacket or cardigan even. I'm 5'3 and 110 pounds and I got a size small if that helps any. The V cut it a little revealing however but not too bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this jumpsuit. I love jumpsuits but don’t own many because a lot of them look and fit terribly. I gave this one a try. I love it! I want a second one! It can be dressed up or worn more casually. I found the fit to be true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Parr

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and flattering
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of the V neck jumpsuit. I love how soft and comfortable the material is. It is wonderful lounge wear, or put on some sandals and go shopping. I will buy the rest of the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Emilianna

customer_reviews.title: Nice outfits for the most part
customer_reviews.text: I gave this three stars because I lost two buttons the same day I wore. I bought it for vacation and wore out two happy hour and two buttons was gone. The only problem is it didn't come with any extra button
customer_reviews.author: Tonisha

customer_reviews.title: Great for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: Love this romper. It can be worn for just about any occasion. I’m 5’3 120lbs and ordered small. Only downside was there were a couple of strings I had to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and soft t-shirt like material. The buttons on the front are functional and make this jumpsuit easy to take on or off. I'm 5'4" and 145 pounds and ordered an XL because I wanted a looser fit and it is perfect! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DebraLilly

customer_reviews.title: Not like shown in photo
customer_reviews.text: First off the photo shows a romper with white/ tortoise colored buttons. Mine showed up with black buttons. And then I go to try it on and the bottom of the pants leg are so stretched out they wouldn’t even stay up on my calves. More of a comfy around the house romper than a classier romper like the photo shows.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Not for taller ladies
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat small. I am 5’6” 125 pounds. Usually a size 2. Fit nice but too short in pants and torso. update... the threads are unraveling After a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Stick with your regular size.
customer_reviews.text: So i read reviews and sized up. I’m 5’4” 38D and 165 lbs and bought an extra large. Normally wear a size large and after reading reviews I decided to size up. Big mistake. The romper is too long and too large on top. Over all it’s a cute romper. Sending it back for a large. 🤞🏻
customer_reviews.author: Kathy DLC

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Surpassed my expectations. Very comfortable. I purchased for traveling in something other than yoga pants. Fits exactly how you’d expect for a romper, without the wedgie look. Perfect with sandals or tennies, sweater or jacket.
customer_reviews.author: GidgetN

customer_reviews.title: Fits 100% as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jumpsuit! I was worried when I bought it bc most of my body is pretty petite, but I’m an average height and have a large chest. (5’6, 130 ish lbs and 34 DD). I ordered a small and was worried about good coverage in my chest area but it’s literally perfect. I can imagine it being a little long for anyone much shorter, the legs definitely go all the way to my ankles. Overall this is an awesome staple piece though that can be dressed up or down super easily!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jumper!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This jumper is soooo comfy and flattering! Just love the green color as well! Good quality, dress up or casual. Good piece to have in your closet.
customer_reviews.author: Steffybing23

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a girl's weekend in Nashville- and now I am obsessed. This is the most comfortable jumpsuit I have worn. Their is a button closure at the top. It fit as expected on me and has held up well in the washer/dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Buxton

customer_reviews.title: Cute romper
customer_reviews.text: The romper is very cute, fits well but runs on the smaller side. I'm 5' and 135lbs so I got the medium and it fits great. I'm happy with it. It looks great with sandals.
customer_reviews.author: J. Avila

product_meta.title: QEESMEI Women's Jumpsuits Rompers V Neck Spaghetti Strap Drawstring Elastic Waisted Long Pants Jumpsuits
feature_bullets: Material: Polyester + Cotton. Stretchy, soft and comfortable to wear, Stylish and casual choice rompers and jumpsuits for women.

Design: V Neck, Spaghetti Strap, Sleeveless, Elastic Waist, Two Side Pockets, Long Pants Jumpsuit. womens jumpsuits and rompers pair with sneakers, heels or sandals. Show you the sexy and charming style.
Occasion: This Jumpsuits for Women Suit for Casual Outdoor, Cocktail, Party, Evening, Club, Wedding, Beach, Vacation, Daily life.
Garment Care: Hand-wash and Machine washable . Package Contents: 1 X Women's Jumpsuit
Note: Pls Look at the Size Chart Before You Order This Pant Rompers and Jumpsuits for women.
